this might be a little late but just when you open the rar file, select the only thing in it and put it in C:'users'/My documents/Electronic arts/The sims 3/InstalledWorlds and not downloads =3

i extracted it to the installed worlds like u said and it didnt show up in my game...help?
Now works fine

so i unrar'd it to be: Barnacle Bay.Sims3Pack

and i put the file in: C:'users'/My documents/Electronic arts/The sims 3/InstalledWorlds

and it doesnt show up on the game.
it wont let me update the game because i torrented that also.
what do i do?

@superkid685
its a launcher package, just double file you extracted the game will automatically capture it and update the game.
pardon my typo.. i meant double click the extracted file. peace.
for all the people that said they used the packeage form of riverview and it didnt show up...try going into the launcher and then installing it that way seemed to work with mine
Thank you Uploader! Fast dwnld, quickly extracted, easy installed into the game. Already playing it. Cheers.
ps. For all you kids who cannot see it in your game. Learn the basic steps of dwnld, extracting, installing first please.

worked perfectly. unzipped to installed worlds in sims 3 folder, then double clicked the file in there and it installed no problems.  quick download too - many thanks (",)
